column5: Anybody use 4tires.ca.  The price is $200 less the the tire place In Town.

Just checked Michelin Defender, still cheaper at Costco and if you run into problems you can go back to Costco along with free balance and rotating.  I don't see too many 4tires.ca stores anywhere. Same for winter tires, WS80 Blizzak for car, $10 a tire cheaper at Costco.

Is there actual brick and mortar stores? I thought they were totally online. I looked into sellers like this and tirerack.com etc but ended up at CT. Costco is probably an even better option like Fisherman mentioned.
